values: Getting at the Heart of God-Focused Ministry, Session 3 (Q & A)Getting at the Heart of God-Focused Ministry, Session 3 (Q & A)

The Scriptures carry answers relating to the nature of fasting, honoring parents in a missionary calling, leading the church in a God-Centered direction, and relating to those who walk in urepentant sin, but some things we will have to wait to know until the age to come.
